title: Software Development Engineer
description: Worked on React-based UI components. Built features and learned responsive design and accessibility.
responsibilities: Led frontend development using JavaScript, ReactJS, and React Native, delivering scalable, production-ready features
Owned end-to-end feature delivery, from requirement analysis to deployment
Integrated SDKs and APIs (GraphQL/REST) in collaboration with backend teams
Improved application performance, code quality, and maintainability through optimization and refactoring
Reduced linting issues and enforced coding standards across the codebase
Developed scripts to remove unused assets, reducing repository size and build time
Collaborated with product managers, designers, and cross-functional teams to meet productrequirements
Implemented and maintained unit tests using Jest to ensure code reliability
Partnered with QA/SDET teams to enhance testing strategies
Contributed to mobile test automation using Java and Appium

title: Quality Engineer
description: Developed modern interfaces using TypeScript, implemented unit tests and CI/CD deployment with the team.
responsibilities: Experienced in Manual Testing with a strong grasp of various testing strategies like regression, smoke, and exploratory testing.
Worked in a SaaS-based edu-tech company, ensuring high product reliability and user satisfaction.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to maintain top-notch product quality through all stages of development.
Successfully delivered multiple high-quality product releases aligned with business goals and timelines.
